sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-dialog v-model="showOrderDialog" title="订单管理" :width="600">
      <!-- 订单管理内容 -->
    </el-dialog>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    props: {
      showOrderDialog: Boolean,
    },
    data() {
      return {
        localShowOrderDialog: this.showOrderDialog,
      };
    },
    watch: {
      showOrderDialog(newVal) {
        this.localShowOrderDialog = newVal;
      },
      localShowOrderDialog(newVal) {
        this.$emit('update:showOrderDialog', newVal);
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  /* OrderDialog 样式 */
  </style>
